title: The Swan Chair  Italian Leather/Without piping/Black
body: The Swan Chair originally designed by Arne Jacobsen for the Royal Hotel in Copenhagen (Circa 1958), commercially designed for lobbies and lounge areas, which now isn’t out of place in residential homes as a centerpiece as a single item or as a pair, match with a side table or as a stand-alone accent chair. Beautiful curves, upholstered in a number of vibrant fabric options or leathers, mounted on a sturdy 4 pointed cast aluminium base.
